scripts.backup: git add tiddlers && git ci -m'tiddler backup' && git push
scripts.build: tiddlywiki --rendertiddlers [!is[system]] $:/core/templates/static.tiddler.html static text/plain --rendertiddler $:/core/templates/static.template.css static/static.css text/plain && cp output/static/HomePage.html output/static/index.html
